item.title: Mozart
item.description: Mozart Description Container Orchestration Tool written in Golang. Similar to tools such as Kubernetes and Docker Swarm. Features Orchestrate containers across multiple nodes. Automatically move containers around to other workers if a worker dies. Automatically bring containers back up if they die. Easy one line agent setup to quickly deploy workers. Fully automated TLS communication between the master and the agents. Create services accounts that can used to access the API allowing for extensions/plugins.
